instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPVCC_S0_CPU: What is PPVCC_S0_CPU? The "PPVCC_S0_CPU" power rail is responsible for supplying power to the CPU when the MacBook is fully on, or in the S0 state. This rail is one of the main voltages that the CPU requires for operation. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
Hi,
i have this board <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (mba 13 2017)
the board start with apple logo half bar and shutdown.
PPBUS and PP3V42 stay fix and good all the time.
Strange thing the board start without battery (normally can't start, I think and test another mba).
I try to clean me and same problem.
I try in bypass SMC mode, same problem.
Do you have an idea?
thanks
Best regards

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
"Strange thing the board start without battery (normally can't start"
All 00165 boards I worked, started without battery.

Try full known good BIOS; not just cleaning ME on original.
Did you try another SSD, or USB test macOS?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
Hi, 
ok for boot without battery, but when not boot, is not normal? (the other Mac is bad?)
I try Monday, the good bios. I try with new ssd, usb boot, without left io board, without trackpad and keyboard, same shutdown.
I can install the System on the ssd but not boot on complete system.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
Hi,
I try with a new good bios, same problem. I try in safe mode (shift press), the mba work well.
maybe CPU? 
thanks
best regards

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
I update some precisions.
i have default picture on display when "shutdown", just on the screen, fan work again, backlight present.
i see <SIGNAL>PPVCC_S0_CPU</SIGNAL>= 1,3V in this case.
Thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Board start with apple logo (half bar) and shutdown
threads.message:
Probably iGPU issue.
See what happens booting Linux, or Windows.
If crashes when you will install grapchis driver, then you know for sure.
You can also try to run a memory test.
